text: Overboard is a 2018 American romantic comedy movie directed by Rob Greenberg, written by Greenberg, Bob Fisher and Leslie Dixon. It stars Eugenio Derbez, Anna Faris, Eva Longoria, John Hannah, Omar Chaparro, Cecilia Suárez, Mariana Treviño and Swoosie Kurtz with Fernando Luján. It is a remake of the 1987 movie of the same name. Overboard was released in the United States on May 4, 2018 to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:2018 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Overboard (2018 movie)
